scenes.title: Welcome
scenes.description: "Welcome to UCSC. Home of the Banana Slug. Apply here and you too can be a slug. But if you're not too sure yet come on by and schedule a tour with us we'll show you what it means to be a slug."

scenes.title: Congratulations!!
scenes.description: "You are now a slug, gimme all your money!"

options.text: Or just follow the damn squirrel!

scenes.title: Tour Start
description: "Ask anyone who's come to UCSC and they're gonna say they came here for the beautiful redwoods, take as many pictures as you want we'll take our time, we like to chill here at UCSC"
"Oh no! you've missed your tour, but you can still hear them in the redwoods. I'm sure you'll be able to catch them if you hurry."
You take a few steps toward the speaker but you feel a sharp pain in your ankle.

options.text: Kick at the weight on your foot.

description: Your foot hits a dead weight. you look down to see a squirrel lying limp. A puddle of blood flows from the squirrels face.
Oh no, you killed a squirrel. Didn't you read somewhere that all wildlife is protected on this campus. Are you going to jail?
But then the squirrel stirs a little, he's alive! You didn't kill a protected animal. Whew!
"oo hoo hoo you're gonna be hearing from my lawyer you little shit."

scenes.title: AHHHHH!!
scenes.description: "Ah come on you big baby it was just a little nibble"

description: You see a squirrel swishing around a liquid in his cheeks.
He spits out a lougie of your blood and a chunk of flesh
He scrunches up his face and says, "B-positive!".
You dial 911 because what the fuck else are you going to do a squirrel is talking and just bit your ankle
As the dial tone begins the squirrel leaps up in a fury and scratches at your hand. You drop your phone and the squirrel jumps on top of it silencing the call.
He looks up at you, offended he says, "Hey seriously you gonna get the cops involved? You're lucky I stopped you when I did, because the cops don't need to know nothing about my operation here."
"yeah my operation, listen I'm sorry I took a bite. I got something to offer you here, and now that I took a bite, we can speak face to face. We're blood now if you know what I'm saying."
"look I can see your confused, lets start from the beginning ok. My name's Buster what's yours?"
"Eh that's a good name you got there kid, listen I see that you've missed your tour."
in the distance you hear the muffled loudspeaker getting further away.
"I happen to provide a service for people in your unique situation. I'm a tour guide here at UCSC."
He points to his chest where a metal pin is attached, you can see the words tour guide scratched into it .

scenes.description: "I'm not really with the school perse, but not everyone gets a spot with the quote unquote 'official tour guides'. And thats where I step in, for a much discounted price I can give you a tour much better than the ones those smucks walking through the forest could ever give you."

options.text: Ok? How much is the tour?

description: The squirrel inches toward you and clicks his teeth.
"Eh, you don't have much of a choice if I'm gonna be real with you. You see I kinda got a case of the rabies."

scenes.description: "hey hey don't freak out just yet, I got a cure back at my place but if I'm gonna bring you there you might as well go on my tour first well we get there."

options.text: Ok? How much is the tour?

scenes.description: "Sixteen hundred dollars."
"Yeah well the tour is only 30 bucks but the cure is $1570."
"Yeah for the super rabies"

description: "Look when I bit you I might passed something or another on, I don't know if you know this but squirrels don't normally talk. I'm a bit of a mutation cooked up here by one of UCSC finest alumni, Dr. Pete Guafani, I'm sure you'll learn about him if you choose to attend this lovely school."

"But in so creating me he didn't just give me the ability to speak, what I'm trying to say here is that I don't just have your run of the mill rabies that your run of the mill hospital can take care of. I got this cure back at my place that'll fix you right up and I'll give you a tour of the campus on the way, how's that sound?"

options.text: Can't you just take me straight to your place?

scenes.description: "Hey don't worry about this super rabies thing, look I'll take you on this tour the super rabies doesn't take super quick to get going anyways you wanted to see the campus for yourself anyways right."
"Are we negotiating here kid, if so I like that, look I'll comp the cure if you pay the tour fee, that's only $30 heck of a deal isn't it."

description: "Yeah sure my venmo handle is @busterthesqui420"
"Alright let's get this party started, Which way you wanna go? Left, Right, up, down, all around, turn around maybe we'll go underground."
Buster keeps mumbling as if he is rapping but he's not saying anything that makes sense.

scenes.title: Mchenry
scenes.description: "Here is Mchenry Library, the biggest library on campus. It has 4 floors and is a great place to study. I like to go in there and eat the books, they're delicious!"

scenes.title: Mchenry
scenes.description: "Alright you want to go up or down in this place?"

scenes.title: Mchenry
scenes.description: "Here is upstairs at Mchenry. Every time I come in this place I find a new area I haven't seen before where these kids study. It's HUGE!"

scenes.title: Mchenry
scenes.description: "Here is the ground floor. This is where you can get some avocado toast. They always kick me out of here for going in their trash. You probably won't have that problem though."

scenes.title: Mchenry
scenes.description: "Alright we outa here. Where to next child?"

scenes.description: "Art Department Info"

scenes.title: Bike Path
scenes.description: "Bike path Info"

scenes.title: Downtown
scenes.description: "This is downtown Santa Cruz, its a short bus or bike from campus. There is all sorts of things to do here, one of my favorites is Abbot Square live music on Saturdays!"

options.text: Bus to Bay Tree Bookstore on campus

scenes.title: The Village
scenes.description: "The Village Info"

scenes.title: East Remote
scenes.description: "This is just a big ass parking lot. If you ever live off campus as an undergrad you will most likely be parking here."

scenes.title: Opers
scenes.description: "This is the view that made me want to live on UCSC's campus. You can do all sorts of activities here such as beach volleyball, slack lining, or any sport that is played on grass!"

scenes.title: Bay Tree Bookstore
scenes.description: "Here is Bay Tree Bookstore. You can buy all sorts of banana slug merch, but unfortunately no squirrel merch. You can also buy books for your classes, school supplies, and technology such as laptops, ipads, or headphones."

scenes.title: Stevenson
scenes.description: Stevenson College is known for its theme, Self and Society, which encourages students to explore their identities and roles in the broader world. Its core course focuses on critical thinking, ethical reflection, and the interplay between the individual and society. Stevenson offers a welcoming community with beautiful views of the Monterey Bay, emphasizing leadership, academic success, and personal growth. The college is also recognized for its vibrant student activities and strong traditions.

scenes.title: Cowell
scenes.description: "Cowell College, the founding college of UC Santa Cruz, emphasizes the theme, The Pursuit of Truth in the Company of Friends. Known for its strong sense of community and intellectual engagement, it offers a stunning hilltop location with views of the Monterey Bay. Cowell provides a liberal arts-inspired approach to education, and its core course explores the nature of justice, critical thinking, and social responsibility. Its residence halls and apartments foster a close-knit, supportive environment for students. It is also home to a pretty fountain that usually isn't working!"

scenes.title: Cowell Dining Hall
scenes.description: "This is the dining hall for Cowell and Stevenson colleges. It is on the older side, but has amazing views and lots of outdoor seating!"

scenes.title: Cowell Coffee Shop
scenes.description: "This is the coffee shop in Cowell College. It is one of many places to get food here on campus. They serve coffee, tea, salads, bagels, BUT NO ACORNS!!??"

scenes.title: College 9 and John R. Lewis Dining Hall
scenes.description: "This is one of the better dining halls on campus. It is the second newest one and there are lots of food options!"

scenes.title: 9/10 Woods
description: "Here are the woods right outside 9/10. I can't prove it but I think that there is some shady whitchcraft going on out here."
"I'm not saying that I'm a witch, but I'm not saying that I'm not a witch."
"I'm just saying that I'm a squirrel and I know what I know."
"Wait shhhh... do you hear that?? I hear some fire beats that way. You want to follow it?"

scenes.title: Baskin Engineering
scenes.description: what the squirrel says about Baskin Engineering

scenes.title: Science and Engineering Library
scenes.description: S&E stands for Science and Engineering. We just use a lot of slang around here. This is another library with 3 floors to study on. Think of it like Mchenry's little brother.

scenes.title: Earth and Marine Science Building
scenes.description: "Here is the Earth and Marine Sciences building. There are classrooms and lecture halls all throughout. I bet you can't guess what the topics of most of the classes held here..."

scenes.title: Porter Woods
scenes.description: "Here are the woods behind porter. If you think I'm crazy, you should see my uncle that lives out here."

scenes.title: Porter Caves
scenes.description: "This is Porter Caves. It's where you go to explore the devils butt crack. It is a deep underground, cave system but unfortunately the school/city closed it down years ago:("
